Blackstorm:

"You said it"said the femme with a smile


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> Battera::
> 
> She transformed into bat mode and followed Blackstorm. "Well, 
> comrades in arms around here are hard to find." as she flew. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blackstorm:
> > 
> > The femme looked to Battera and said "I think that Maxima will be 
> > agree... "
> > 
> > And looking to Maxima she said "I'm ready to go, Maxima.... 
Battera 
> > it's new here can she join us...? Ya know that close link with 
> > comrades are very usefull in case of attack"
> > 
> > she said that while she transformed to her robot mode and 
followed 
> > Maxima...
> >

> will

> > > trip."

was

> > > past; she opened the doors, Made sure the sentinel systems 
would

> > > the both of them... then made her way outside. There she 
trotted,

was
